name: AssetRegistry

commentData.description: The AssetRegistry is used to manage a set of assets stored on the Blockchain.

methods.name: getAllAssetRegistries

commentData.description: Get a list of all existing asset registries.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The user's security context.
tags.name: securityContext

tags.title: param
tags.description: The ModelManager to use for this asset registry.

tags.name: bnc

tags.title: param
tags.description: Should system registries be included? (defaults to false)
tags.name: includeSystem

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that will be resolved with a list of {@link AssetRegistry}
instances representing the asset registries.
